name: Opera Prima
description:
Plot

By random chance, fate offers the protagonist the opportunity for a once-in-a-lifetime experience - will you take advantage of it?

  • An interactive short -story with classic point & click interface
  • Help your character take decisions by choosing its interior monologue
  • Featuring 5 different endings
  • Playable in English and Spanish
  • Please play with sound on!

Important!: every text line stays on the screen until you click to skip.

Disclaimer: due to a work-related trip, we are uploading the game days in advance from the jam deadline. We apologize for any bugs you may encounter, which we unfortunately cannot solve until next week when we're back. Thanks for playing!

Disclaimer 2: We don't have any Linux or Mac computer, these are straight Unity builds. Please let us know if they work (or not!). Thanks!
